sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Much of the EXFO data references Site information. Sites will be imported regardless of related location information, but it is highly recommended to use ServiceNow Locations to track location data. 

  1. To allow the integration to create new locations, set the property value to 'true'. 
  2. If you do not want the integration to create new locations, and instead try to query on existing records, set the property value to 'false'.
  3. By default, the integration will query on the "Street address" field to find existing location records. If you would like to override this with your own query, you may do so using the "SGEXFOLocationMapOverride" extension point.
  4. Save and click "Back to Guided Setup"
  5. "Mark as Complete" and proceed to the next step of the Guided Setup.
sys_embedded_help_content.name: exfo_sgc_import_locations-setup
